q1.question: How accurate is the AI extraction?
q1.answer: Cap2Cal's AI achieves 99% accuracy on event posters. Our model has been trained on over 100,000 posters across 8 languages. In rare cases where the AI isn't confident, you'll see an editable preview before saving.

q2.question: Which calendars does Cap2Cal work with?
q2.answer: Cap2Cal works with ALL calendar apps: Google Calendar, Apple Calendar (iCal), Microsoft Outlook, and any other calendar app on your phone. We use standard calendar APIs that work universally.

q3.question: Is my data private and secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely. All captured events are stored locally on your device by default. We don't upload your photos or event data to our servers unless you opt-in to cloud sync. We're GDPR and CCPA compliant.

q4.question: Does Cap2Cal work offline?
q4.answer: Yes! You can capture events offline. They'll be processed and added to your calendar automatically once you're back online. Perfect for festivals with spotty service.

q5.question: What languages does Cap2Cal support?
q5.answer: Currently, Cap2Cal extracts events in English, German, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, and Korean. More languages coming soon!

q6.question: Is Cap2Cal really free?
q6.answer: Yes! All features—unlimited captures, AI extraction, calendar integration—are 100% free. No hidden costs, no subscriptions.

q7.question: What makes Cap2Cal different from Google Lens?
q7.answer: While Google Lens can extract text from images, it doesn't understand events or integrate with calendars. Cap2Cal is purpose-built for event posters, achieving 99% accuracy and seamlessly adding events to your calendar in one tap.

q8.question: Can I share events with friends?
q8.answer: Yes! You can share captured events via text, email, or social media. Your friends don't need Cap2Cal to see the event details.
